page.title: 14Parks in Ilford.
page.content: {Recreation in Seven Kings.} In our area, which is Seven Kings, we were looking at recreation. We saw what was available. There was Seven Kings Park, the Ford's Sports Ground, Westwood Recreation and School Playing Fields. {Seven Kings Park} Seven Kings Park is a large park; it has four park keepers. They do not like having dogs in the park and would ban them if they could. They do not allow{cycling}in the park but this rule is often disobeyed. All types of people go to the park, especially the young, but swings and other equipment are often vandalised. There is a stream where people pic-nic in the summer.{Tennis clubs}use the park for practice. Chadwell Heath High School.
